title: Instructional Design Strategy Workshop for Virtual Credit Recovery Programs

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge of pedagogy and experience with secondary education curricula
context.additional_context: Enhancing instructional design competencies for effective operation of virtual credit recovery programs targeting pre-service and in-service teachers

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the core components of a virtual credit recovery program (knowledge assessment, personalized learning pathways, support systems).
Learners can design at least three effective teaching strategies for science subjects in an online self-directed learning environment.
Learners can propose improvement plans based on positive/negative experiential cases of the VCR (Video-Case Reflection) program.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
